Package org.radarbase.auth.token

Class JwtRadarToken

java.lang.Object
org.radarbase.auth.token.AbstractRadarToken
org.radarbase.auth.token.JwtRadarToken
All Implemented Interfaces:
RadarToken
public class JwtRadarToken extends AbstractRadarToken
Implementation of RadarToken based on JWT tokens.

  • Constructor Details

    • JwtRadarToken

      public JwtRadarToken(com.auth0.jwt.interfaces.DecodedJWT jwt)
      Initialize this JwtRadarToken based on the DecodedJWT. All relevant information will be parsed at construction time and no reference to the DecodedJWT is kept. Therefore, modifying the passed in DecodedJWT after this has been constructed will not update this object.
      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token to use to initialize this object
